004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.TrapezoidProfile.State;
008import static edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
009
010import edu.wpi.first.math.controller.ProfiledPIDController;
011import edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.TrapezoidProfile;
012
013/**
014 * A subsystem that uses a {@link ProfiledPIDController} to control an output. The controller is run
015 * synchronously from the subsystem's periodic() method.
016 *
017 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
018 */
019public abstract class ProfiledPIDSubsystem extends SubsystemBase {
020  protected final ProfiledPIDController m_controller;
021  protected boolean m_enabled;
022
023  private TrapezoidProfile.State m_goal;
024
025  /**
026   * Creates a new ProfiledPIDSubsystem.
027   *
028   * @param controller the ProfiledPIDController to use
029   * @param initialPosition the initial goal position of the controller
030   */
031  public ProfiledPIDSubsystem(ProfiledPIDController controller, double initialPosition) {
032    m_controller = requireNonNullParam(controller, "controller", "ProfiledPIDSubsystem");
033    setGoal(initialPosition);
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Creates a new ProfiledPIDSubsystem. Initial goal position is zero.
038   *
039   * @param controller the ProfiledPIDController to use
040   */
041  public ProfiledPIDSubsystem(ProfiledPIDController controller) {
042    this(controller, 0);
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  public void periodic() {
047    if (m_enabled) {
048      useOutput(m_controller.calculate(getMeasurement(), m_goal), m_controller.getSetpoint());
049    }
050  }
051
052  public ProfiledPIDController getController() {
053    return m_controller;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Sets the goal state for the subsystem.
058   *
059   * @param goal The goal state for the subsystem's motion profile.
060   */
061  public void setGoal(TrapezoidProfile.State goal) {
062    m_goal = goal;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Sets the goal state for the subsystem. Goal velocity assumed to be zero.
067   *
068   * @param goal The goal position for the subsystem's motion profile.
069   */
070  public void setGoal(double goal) {
071    setGoal(new TrapezoidProfile.State(goal, 0));
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Uses the output from the ProfiledPIDController.
076   *
077   * @param output the output of the ProfiledPIDController
078   * @param setpoint the setpoint state of the ProfiledPIDController, for feedforward
079   */
080  protected abstract void useOutput(double output, State setpoint);
081
082  /**
083   * Returns the measurement of the process variable used by the ProfiledPIDController.
084   *
085   * @return the measurement of the process variable
086   */
087  protected abstract double getMeasurement();
088
089  /** Enables the PID control. Resets the controller. */
090  public void enable() {
091    m_enabled = true;
092    m_controller.reset(getMeasurement());
093  }
094
095  /** Disables the PID control. Sets output to zero. */
096  public void disable() {
097    m_enabled = false;
098    useOutput(0, new State());
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Returns whether the controller is enabled.
103   *
104   * @return Whether the controller is enabled.
105   */
106  public boolean isEnabled() {
107    return m_enabled;
108  }
109}
